document.full_text: about 200 militants crossed into pakistan's rugged northwest from afghanistan on wednesday and attacked a security checkpost, killing one policeman, police said, and a television station put the death toll at seven.
document.title: about 200 "launch cross-border attack" on pakistan post
lines_and_colors: about 200 militants crossed into pakistan's rugged northwest from afghanistan on wednesday and attacked a security checkpost, killing one policeman, police said, and a television station put the death toll at seven.
